data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Zhengzhou, Henan, China.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zhengzhou, Henan, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Zhengzhou, Henan, China know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of Zhengzhou.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Zhengzhou
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Over 90.8 percent of the people of Zhengzhou are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, we ask for 874 new simple churches in the county of Zhengzhou, Henan, China. Place a simple church in every community of the 4,372,400 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.section_summary:
the county of Zhengzhou, Henan, China has a population of 4,372,400.

We estimate Zhengzhou has 331,695 people who might know Jesus, 70,636 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,970,069 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Zhengzhou who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
